//Activiy_configuracion_paseo Strings// Define the weigth Time Dog(s) Add Category: Back Payment for walk # dogs, walk time Category, # days Discount Promotional Coupon Subtotal Payment total Credit Card Select your credit card Add
//Activiy_account Strings// Name Last Surname Middle Surname Phone Number Other Phone Number SEND
//Activity_lector Strings// Scan the QR code found on the puppys plate
//Activity_login_options// By using CaminanDog you accept the privacy policy
//Activity_maps_solic_pas Strings// Cancel
//Activity_tracking// TO PAY
//Card_pipi_popo// Name
//Dialog_add_perro// Cancel Add yor dog Save Data ¿Is dog dewormed? ¿Does your dog have flea treatment? Single registry of companion animals RUAC; if you do not have it, then only CDMX? Enter RUAC (Optional) Of Polyvalent vaccines have: First Dose Second Dose Third Dose
//Dialog_add_vacunas// Vaccination
//Dialog_add_agenda// Select the dates you want to save Walks 3 Walks 5 Walks 10 Walks Calendar Agenda Continue
//Dialog_agregar_cupon// Add Code Enter the coupon code Free walk coupons will generate a temporary charge of $3.00 which will be refunded within a maximum period of 48 hours
//Dialog_calif// Rate your last walk How much did you enjoy your walk Tell us more about the CaminanDog experience and about your walker Walker Yes or No Did your walker arrive in a timely manner for your pet(s)? Did your walker arrive with a CaminanDog Shirt/sweatshirt and cap? Were your pet(s) provided with an aromatherapy/smell therapy session?
//Dialog_chat_list// Contact Center Ask for availability for walks,Solve or resolve your doubts / or reschedule your walk. CaminanDog customer service CaminanDog Advisor Contact with your walker by dog walk Without chats You still do not have active or scheduled walks
//Dialog_chat_soporte// Remember that the use of this chat is strictly for questions related to the service of CaminanDog. Any abuse will be reported or punishable/sanctioned Sending... Write a message
//Dialog_complete_register// Tell us more about you Surname Email
//Dialog_confirmar// Do you want to end the walk?
//Dialog_elim_card// Wait... Accept
//Dialog_info_agenda// We are scheduling your walks and choosing the most suitable walker Thank you very much for your purchase!
//Dialog_si_no// Delete Do you want to delete the identification card?
//Dialog_vincular_placa// Link Plate Select the dog you want to link to this badge or plate. Remember that you can only link one dog per plate Available Dogs Pay Walk Pay Package
//Clase_Account// Complete register Name Required Please fill in this field Last Name Required Your account probably does not have a register email Number Required Please use your area code Wrong number Please wait Photo Uploading ... Image Updated Successfully Image Uploaded Successfully To provide you with a better service, it is neccessary to fill in some information
//Clase_Account_No_Editable// Could not revoke access
//AmpliarVigenciaRecuperandog// To continue its necessary to add your credit card Click on the add button We are processing the valid payment order for your plates There was no answer Error function the payment was not processed Payment not made Purchase was successful! Charges have been added to your card, thank you for your payment!
//Codigos_Fragment// Code not entered Invalid Code You can only add a code until you use or delete the active coupon The code entered has been previously used Code not applicable The promo code has already been applied before Enter a Code You must enter your code The promo code is only valid for new users Valid Code Coupon was added correctly, remember that you will not be able to add another code until you use or delete this coupon Delete coupon Are you sure you want to remove this coupon? Remember that this action cannot be undone Eliminate Coupon removed successfully Permissions Denied Aplied CaminanDog migth not to work correctly
//Comprar_Recuperandog// We are processing the payment order for your plates There was an error processing your payment In a maximum period of 2 hour we will contact you to inform you about the shipment of your plates, Thank you for your purchase! Your card was entered correctly, now you can use it to make your puppy happy Your card could not be added, please enter another GPS Disabled Please turn your GPS on your device Activate Get Location Remember that in order to hace a precision of the place where you require your walks(s) or use the functions fo your RecuperanDog badge, you need to share your location with CaminanDog
//Configuracion_Paseo// Upload a photo. How do you want to perform this action? Gallery Camera Could not upload the file This field can not be blank Promotional Coupon Yes has vaccinations Not has vaccinations The profile of: Do not yet have vaccination information in his profile We are proccessing the payment order for the package scheduled for: Error No response from server In a maximun period of two hours we will assign you a walker and your cards will be shown in the "Active walks" section, THANKS for your purchase! An error ocurred while proccessing the payment The "Sport" category does not admit more than two selected puppies Please modify your selection To continue you must select at least one puppy Add one The chosen category does not admit more than 4 selected puppies Add Coupon Record will be added
//Contenedor_Fragment// Account My Walks
//Contenedor_Activos// Active
//Comprar_RecuperanDog// Hi Provided an aromatherapy session for your pet(s)?
//Contenedor_RecuperanDog// Active Service Inactive Service Searching Alert Confirm Vinculation Are you sure you want to link this dog to this plate or badge? Once you accept you cannot undo it Enter a code not busy Enter a valid code Remember that to scan the plate of your dog you must accept the camera permission Remember that to link your puppys plate you must accept the permission of the camera
//Datos_Para_Contacto_Recuperando// Enter a Name Enter a phone number or enter at least 10 digits Enter a valid email address Enter a Message The message is too long You must select to update
//Formulario_Direccion// Confirm Address
//Historic_Map// Walker: "No data obtained" Pick up point Location permission You want to activate your location? Permission denied Progress
//Historic_Paseo_Fragment/ Tiempopas Id Paseo: Categoria: Numero de Perrhijos: Calificacion: Tiempo:
//login_Options// Ocurrio un error al tratar de ingresar." Access Denied Your Facebook account does not have emil. To access you must create a CaminanDog account Probably the email address linked to your Facebook account is already in use Could not login Permissions Denied
//Login_Activity// Enter an email Enter a password Please verify your e-mail
//Main_Activity// My Account Are you sure you want to go out? Yes Principal DogChilds Cards Codes Rates Allies It is empty Could not log out
//Maps_Solic_Pas// Searching... Search walker Try later please There are no walkers Empty does not change request or status Change request and status Empty Array We were unable to contact a suitable walker Do you want to repeat the search Does not change request or status Current walker you work with Here Proccesing payment.. The server refused the connection please try again Payment processed successfully Have more dogs Category does not match We are contacting a walker, in a moment we will go for: Me Point A Point B Edit Are you sure you want to delete this dog? Succesfully deleted! An error ocurred Remember that to upload a photo of your puppy you must accept the permission of the camera
//My_Firebase_Messaging_Service// Affair
//Recuperandog_information// Tel: Location of: Reported Plate
//Reportado_Fragment// The loss of your pet linked to this plate has already been reported to all our walkers by when one finds it they will start the RecuperanDog process by scanning the plate. If you have already met your pet, you can finish the report of loss- Finalize the loss report If your pet linked to this plate is missing, you can report its dissappearance so that all our walkers receive a search notification with the characteristic data of your pet and in this way they can search for it in their walking areas. Report missing pet
//Reset_Password// Enter your e-mail We have sent you the instructions to reset your password Sending reset email failed
//Signup_Activity// Repeat your password Password do not match User created successfully: Something wrong Register created successfully We have sent you an email to activate your account There was a problem creating the new register
//Cards_fragment// Problem Are you sure you want to delete the card? Correct An error ocurred while deleting the card
//Tracking// Paid
//Tracking_Map// Active Walks Time to deliver ride Tiempo de entregar paseo 2hr Remember that un order to have communication by phone with your walker you must accept the call permission
//Fragment_datos_para_contacto_recuperandog// Telephone Email Contact Information Update Message(Up to 280 characters) By clicking on this box you authorize CaminanDog to share this data every time your puppy´s tag is scanned, if they are empty they will not be able to contact you or report on their status
//Fragment_no_edit_account_fragmnt// Day Month Year
//Fragmnet_ampliar_vigencia// Add Card Pay Plates Select your card Total to pay Extend Validity Linked puppy Current validity Price p/u
//Fragmnet_comprar_recuperandog// Uploading... Tell us what is the delivery address Enter street or place name Enter the interior number; department or detail Sending cost
//Fragmnet_codigos// Coupons Invite your contacts to the CaminanDog experience Your promotional code is Share Soon available for all our users Description
//Dialog_write_confirm// Successfully Sent Your data has been sent successfully
//Dialog_add_casa// Add your House
//Dialog_vincular_surface// Scan the RecuperanDog plate that you want to link
//Elemento_paseos_activos// ID WALK CATEGORY DATE date WALKER walker DOGS perros NUM DOGS dogsnumber
//form_direccion// Outdoor Number Interior Number Street Municipality or Delegation State Postal Code
//fragment_contenedor_recuperandog// Write your information Pets with Plate Link Plate Extend Validity Buy Plate Read Code Contact Information
//Fragment_Inicio// Request Walk Scheduled Walk Where is your puppy? House Define an address Latest Request a Walk For a better experience. Please turn on the GPS sensor of your device
//Fragment_mis_perritos// To edit or remove a dog, tap its tab. To add a dog touch the + button
//Fragment_recuperandog_informacion// Report Puppy Name Validity Date Last read date and time Reading direction Reader name Message sent Menssage Call
//Fragment_Reportado// Report Pet puppy name Num. of Plate
//Fragment_tracking// Category Time travel Of
//Inicio_Fragment// is not correct Please remove all ; from this section Please enter the exterior and/or interior number of the address, if it does not exist, enter SN Please enter street or place name It was not possible format the date If you need to modify any date already scheduled, help us to reschedule at least one hour before the walk. Once the walker arrives at your address, there will be no refund. Not sure of this last sentence Select only days select unless more than not allowed Select an hour for: Unfortunately we cannot find a DogLover for you at the selected time, try to book after 12:00pm Date in range This field is required Enter a 10 digit number Walk of the at Remember that to have communication with your walker you must accept the permission
//Recuperandog_Informacion_Fragment// Your location
